author: I_like_Lego
title: A racer and a jump all in one
review:
I got this from a friend,and it is really good (okay so all set's are good),but the best thing is it goes really fast when you pull it back and let go,and with a jump it can jump good and go fast,a good racer.

Pros:)
.Racer
.Pull back motor
.big wheels
.yellow side thing
.back fin thing
.nice little driver area 
.yellow bricks
.see through lights
.dark red studs
.vents
.Jump

Cons:(
.STICKERS!
Overall 10/10 great set for non racer fans.
